author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

In #27214 a header consistency check failure was missed before the integration, and the same problem may be seen in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-06-19-2300 . This PR updates the BuildFile of ```TopQuarkAnalysis/TopEventSelection``` adding the dependency on Utilities/Xerces .

#### PR validation:

```scram b code-checks``` is now successful on ```TopQuarkAnalysis/TopEventSelection```, and the code compiles correctly.
title: Update BuildFile for TopQuarkAnalysis/TopEventSelection
